documentation.text:
@dev Returns total winnings for a participant based on current accumulated interest
 @dev ... and assuming the passed _outcome wins.

@notice gets the winning outcome from realitio
 @dev this function call will revert if it has not yet resolved
@notice has the question been finalized on realitio?
@notice common function for all outgoing DAI transfers
@notice common function for all incoming DAI transfers
@notice mints Dai, will only work on a testnet

documentation.text:
@dev Returns total winnings for a participant based on current accumulated interest
 @dev ... and assuming the passed _outcome wins.

@notice gets the winning outcome from realitio

getWinnings(uint256).details: Returns total winnings for a participant based on current accumulated interest... and assuming the passed _outcome wins.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
